mapper.update: CREATE TABLE ${newTableName}( id int auto_increment primary key, info_id varchar(100) null, data_index varchar(50) null, timestamp datetime null, mediation float null, attention float null, channel_1 float null, channel_2 float null, channel_3 float null, channel_4 float null, channel_5 float null, channel_6 float null, channel_7 float null, channel_8 float null )
